website_summaries.verdict: These reusable sandwich bags have a practical design and are made of strong materials, but may pose some challenges when it comes to cleaning, drying, and closing them.
pros: Lay-flat design is very similar to traditional disposable sandwich bags
Easy to stash in lunch bags
You get 5 bags in different colors
Company offers a variety of styles and sizes for different storage needs
cons: Zip-seals become difficult to maneuver with repeated use, and often won't seal completely
Hard to get the corners dry, which could cause mold to form

customer_reviews.title: Zip won’t close
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normall write reviews...but... I love the idea of these but the closure stops working. I’ve hand washed the bags in warm water and after a few weeks (for 2 of the bags at least) the closure won’t line up so I can’t close the bags. Which makes it kind of pointless. It’s a great idea but I’m not getting anywhere near the hundreds of uses they advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Zipper stops working after too few uses.
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses (just long enough to get you out of the Amazon return window) the zipper tops start becoming extremely difficult to close. I would strongly recommend that you NOT purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mirash & Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, have been using them daily for a couple months now. Only negative observation is that black mold can grow inside, deep into the seam at the bottom, if you are not very thorough in washing and DRYING them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these, very easy to open and seal. They are all similar to a quart size bag. I hand wash these so they last longer. I try to air dry them, but there is always a small amount of water left at the bottom of the bag, so I have to wipe each one before putting them away.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Zen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eco option
customer_reviews.text: Such a good purchase! They fit a lot, have a great seal, and are so handy. I would caution though, like tuperwear if you put something orange or red in them they will stain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made from similar material to a shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying silicone bags but they are made from a type of vinyl called PEVA, and smell exactly like a new vinyl shower curtain. I washed them and left them out for 2 days but the smell has not diminished. It hard to believe that they are food grade safe. I will be returning these immediately.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: We have had these for a half a month, and they are great. Food does not stick to them, thanks to the rounded corners. They are hard to dry, though, so I followed the suggestion of another reviewer here. I pull out my ladles or tall mugs and cover one glass/mug/ladle with one silicon bag, allowing the water to drip out and evaporate out. Just remember, these bags are NOT SUPPOSED TO GO IN THE DISHWASHER. They are really easy to clean. Just a dot of dish soap and a wash cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Xenia

customer_reviews.title: I want to love these, but I don't
customer_reviews.text: For people who like reusable zip bags this are probably great. I bought them to see if they'd be a good alternative to sandwich bags in school lunch and for our family they're not. I have used these to freeze soup and they worked great. However, we don't use plastic baggies much and when I do I've found I prefer the bag to these. They're a pain to clean and dry.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Save Money/Reduce Waste
customer_reviews.text: These are a great way to save money and reduce waste. I've been using them daily for several months without any issues. They can be washed in the dishwasher but my dishwasher isn't great so I didn't think they were getting cleaned. I've been hand washing them which isn't difficult but I don't like to handwash anything so I gave a lower score for that. Otherwise, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: CPeters

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I make my own ice packs with this with fish detergent as the base (hence the purple in the picture). I also freeze raw chicken in these and store vegetables and fruit. Love these bags! I’ve had the same set for >6 months and no issues yet!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: They’re just ok
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of these, but in practical use I will prob only put dry goods in them so they are easy to clean. I’ve put a few messy food items, and while washing them by hand isn’t too difficult, the drying process sucks. I end up having to flip them inside out which is a pain and a little bit difficult bc the plastic isn’t very flexible. I had hopes of never using ziplocs again, but these aren’t easy enough to use to completely do away w disposables.
customer_reviews.author: MzB

customer_reviews.title: Dirty/moldy
customer_reviews.text: I like these bags because I hate throwing out all the ziplocks. I used these for a week and one of the bags was in the dishwasher for 1 day while I waited to have enough to do a load and when I took it out after the wash it has this black discoloration which I can only imagine is mold. I tried scrubbing it and it won’t come off at all.
customer_reviews.author: William Gaudreault

customer_reviews.title: Have had these for 3 Years, still works!
customer_reviews.text: I have had these since 2017 (wow) and they still working amazingly! Only cons are that they are sometimes difficult to close, and if you put something potent in them (like onion) they can trap that smell and sometimes leave that after you wash it. But they have had constant daily use since I bought them 3 years ago, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! They zip shut and work well! I had a set for over a year and just bought these as replacements (I accidentally put sharp knives in the sink with the old ones and got holes in two of them). I would definitely recommend them. I even put them on the top rack of the dishwasher and no problems!
customer_reviews.author: yellowkmac

customer_reviews.title: Printing on bags disintegrates
customer_reviews.text: These bags seems durable but we washed them in the dishwasher prior to using and most of the printing came off. Not a big deal but it was kind of messy inside our dishwasher. The seal at the top seems sturdy though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Super cool. We just started using these
customer_reviews.text: Super cool. We just started using these, along with some of our silicone others with the sliding guide on the top. These are thinner, not sure of their longevity. We did wash on the top rack of the dishwasher, though that may not be recommended. They are a great alternative to disposable Ziplocks, for those concerned to reduce plastic waste.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. Harkins

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but over time they get harder and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great at first but over time they get harder and harder to zip until you just cant close them any more, not sure why
customer_reviews.author: Scotney M. Young

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea, but...
customer_reviews.text: I think I have had these for over a year- but I found they stopped zipping shut easily after a few uses and then I stopped choosing. Also, I found them hard to wash on the inside. Just pulled one out and colored top is coming undone from the body of the bag. Maybe the ones with a base would be easier to wash than the flat?
customer_reviews.author: Delaware resident

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to seal, Stays sealed even with liquid. Easy to clean. Doesn't retain smells or stains
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: Kind of a headache.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are super hard to get clean down near the bottom of the bag, and the zip closure doesn’t line up well anymore - we’ve only used them a handful of times.
customer_reviews.author: Akline

customer_reviews.title: Don’t zip after a number of uses
customer_reviews.text: The more you use these, the more impossible they become to zip. I’ve had these for a few months now. One of the bags ripped the first time I used it so I’ve been using the remaining. I’m probably about to have to throw one or two away soon because they will not catch the track to zip. That leaves me down to two that are still working easily. On the positive side, they’ve definitely saved a large number of plastic bags! But I’ll probably try to find a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Faucheux

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and very durable, but not easy to clean at all. They don’t really turn inside out so it’s difficult to clean the corners and then the take a long time to dry because they don’t really open up wide. They’re actually too durable (thick). Maybe more importantly after a month of using them they no longer close easily. I’m seeing that my kids no longer use them.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Nothing better than your food tasting like the bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bag made food taste horrible tried washing and scrubbing with soap, water and vinegar and it didn't make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Berg

customer_reviews.title: Beyond my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I swear by these bags! I have been using them for the last year. I have gone as far as buying the gallon size. They are great for taking snacks as a carry-on to the airport, using them for your lunch, and storing in your freezer or refrigerator. I recommend them to all my friends and family. Not to mention I’m no longer having to buy single use plastic bags.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Weve had these a few months now and I love them. Ive only handwashed and let dry on our bottle mat so I dont know how they hold up in the dishwasher. We use them for snacks, leftovers, first aid kit for the diaper bag, etc. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Connor Peoples

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, size and price!
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy, zip easily and hold a good amount of all types of foods. I haven't tried liquids yet, and honestly probably won't not because I doubt these could contain the mess (i bet they could) i just prefer to use a jar instead. These are great for dry food as well as refrigerated and freezer foods. The best deal I've found yet!
customer_reviews.author: Pantherina

customer_reviews.title: Don't put in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: My family and I really like these reusable zipper bags. They are a good size, definitely leakproof, and sturdy. However, they must be hand washed. When put in the dishwasher, no matter how I try to secure them, they flip around and land anywhere full of detergent water. Also, one of them can no longer be zipped easily, because of the heat in the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Great, leak proof reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: These reusable bags are really easy to use. We even use them for our 5 year old’s lunches and he can open and close them easily. They are easy to wash and roll up nicely to store. So far they seem pretty leak proof!
customer_reviews.author: M Blue

customer_reviews.title: These are so great!
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea!! One of my resolutions is to be more environmentally friendly and until I got these I didn't really realize how much plastic I was truly using. There's absolutely no need for one use plastic bags after this purchase! They're really great and seem pretty durable. Definitely will buy more in other sizes! :)
customer_reviews.author: Brian Gray

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: I'm bummed to write a negative review, but I tossed all my baggies in the dishwasher to be cleaned before their first use... only to discover almost all of them had melted shut by the time thy were finished. I was able to pry a few open but the zippers now don't work at all. Can't use them anymore. I'd try another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Hard to slide open and closed
customer_reviews.text: These work really well if you can get the plastic slide to go on easily. Some are easier to close than others. I would give this product 5 stars for keeping food fresh.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stout

customer_reviews.title: Many usage
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. There are so many uses for them not just for lunch. I will be ordering another set. You can put them in the freezer refrigerator and dishwasher and they don't take up space like plastic containers
customer_reviews.author: SGTCOORS

customer_reviews.title: Great bags, zip does get difficult to close with age
customer_reviews.text: These are a great alternative to throw away zip-top bags. They seem to be leak-proof, They take a while to dry, but just prop it open with a spoon or cup. As the bags get older the zipper gets more difficult to close. But overall they are a great product, and I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Hult

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Leakproof
customer_reviews.text: These reusable bags are of great quality. They do take up more space in a lunchbox compared to one-time-use plastic bags. They can stain and become difficult to clean but are able to go in the dishwasher on the top shelf for a deeper clean.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.

customer_reviews.title: Ziplock closure stinks
customer_reviews.text: The ziplock closure is very hard to use and stops working completely after not very long. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sahni

customer_reviews.title: Zipper does not zip close!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great when you first get but is actually terrible and does not last. After washing the zipper part no longer sticks together. Definitely do not buy! They also stain easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to go green and these definitely help! Kind of hard to get them to dry after you wash them. You have to be patient.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I use them for milk storage since I pump so much, they’re big but they hold a lot of milk and it’s less plastic to constantly throw away. The only thing is wash them well and put them on some kind of rack to dry properly so no bacteria gets in.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I’m really enjoying these bags! The only downside is that they do take a long time to dry. I wash them in the dishwasher top rack. Great size, doesn’t smell like plastic or make your food taste weird. 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: ColeTrain

customer_reviews.title: Eliminate plastic bag waste
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing! I was sick of wasting bags. I use these daily.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Servello

customer_reviews.title: L h
customer_reviews.text: They both feel sturdy and are sturdy the seal is a bit harder to close than other reusable gl bags I’ve had. To wash I’ve found you have to turn them inside out else they won’t dry in the drying cycle (which can be a bit tricky.) they are a decent size and fit a traditional pb&j sandwich w/o any trouble
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet but was very disappointed to read that they were made in China after I already recieved them. They look pretty durable and will definitely do the job of holding snacks but I will always have a bit of worry about chemicals in the material in the back of my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie-Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Hard to dry
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but hard to get the inside dry after cleaning. I worry about them getting funky because it’s hard to get the corners to dry out. Otherwise seems great for lunchboxes and leftovers!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bags!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I use these daily for our lunches. We no longer use multiple plastic bags, or throw away multiple plastic bags. I started using them first and then my husband asked me to get him some. They have held up great! And we love not making extra plastic waste each day!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Rice

customer_reviews.title: Overly impressed with product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as an alternative to Ziploc plastic bags for lunches / traveling. I was not completely certain what the quality would be - but I must say that I am incredibly impressed with the purchase. True to the posting they are leakproof! Great quality, heavy duty, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: AMQuici

customer_reviews.title: Nice eco-friendly product
customer_reviews.text: We use for sandwiches. One of the bags broke lengthwise at the seam creating a large hole so we can't use it any longer. Easy to wipe clean or place in the dishwasher (top rack).
customer_reviews.author: BisonWoman

customer_reviews.title: Hard to dry.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I thought they would be. I teallly like them. Hard to get dry have to prop open with a cup to allow to dry.
customer_reviews.author: NurseS

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I like how heavy duty they are. Super nice for packing lunch. Easy to clean. Great zip close!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomeR

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are really great for the price because some brands are selling them at such a high price! The only con I have with these bags is that they are a little difficult to clean. I put them in the dish washer but they dont get fully clean like they were supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Kenz

customer_reviews.title: Great for work and to pack toddler snacks
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! Easy to clean and dry and great for leftovers or to bring food to work. Highly recommend them for moms on the go and to pack snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam C

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but a bit of a fail.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t seem to get the strong scent out of these since receiving them and one of them has a broken zipper even though it’s never been used. I’ve only opened them to clean them. Great concept but a bit of a fail.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: The bags do not close very easily (and sometimes not at all) so not good for ...
customer_reviews.text: The bags do not close very easily (and sometimes not at all) so not good for liquidy items or small pieces of food.
customer_reviews.author: MAIGHNA J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Highly recommend. Great price, sturdy. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!! So easy to clean, I just flip them inside out and put them in the washing machine. Also I feel like when I store cut up fruits and vegetables in them (in the refrigerator) they tent to last a few days longer than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Reed

customer_reviews.title: Reduce your waste! Completely replaced
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! No more wasting plastic baggies for my lunches! I washed one in the dishwasher in a somewhat distorted shape, and it’s left permanent folds and contours that I didn’t intend for. I think I’ll just hand wash going forward
customer_reviews.author: Roy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Super value!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little bags and they do not leak!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Oz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These ziploc bags are fantastic! The zip closure is easy to use and secures the contents. They are simple to clean and they dry quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! I have been trying to live as ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! I have been trying to live as waste free as possible and these are making my life so much easier! I have yet to use them in the freezer, but in the fridge my food was kept fresh! The colors on the zipper are fun and I love that I can see my food
customer_reviews.author: Delaney Heileman

customer_reviews.title: Nice and useful
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to clean. I’ve only used dry food in them so I’m not certain about the leakproof-ness. But I’ve been pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Watford

customer_reviews.title: saving
customer_reviews.text: love that these baggies replace over 300 plastic bags! So far have had great luck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Says ok to dishwasher but very hard to close after.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dreisen

customer_reviews.title: Love them and use them everyday!
customer_reviews.text: These bags have really cut down on my single usage products. I love how durable they are and the air tightness. I mostly use them for snacks and for cut veggies and they work wonderfully! A little prone to staining but very great nonetheless. Worth investing in if you care about minimizing your impact on the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney C.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Got these after getting the stand up bags, love these! Only down side is the drying part
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: I really want to love these. I do have issues with closing the ...
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love these. I do have issues with closing the seal on a couple of the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bummer.
customer_reviews.text: Bummer. Worked great the first couple times but most of them don’t close anymore without a fight. Complete pain.
customer_reviews.author: jwhite

customer_reviews.title: Convenient way to reduce waste!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I use them everyday for my lunch and snacks and haven't had any problems. I haven't used them for anything liquid but I know they seal well to keep fruit, veggies and snacks fresh. I will definitely be buying another set of them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leak proof and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Dishwasher safe. I have poured extremely hot liquids in it with no problems. Stores veggies and fruits with what seems to be a longer time period. Most importantly it is leak proof even when filled fluids. The seal on the bags seem to be very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Bsledge72

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% leakproof
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bags for just your everyday usage. However, they are not 100% leakproof. Tried them out in a cooler camping for a few days. Once the ice melted, some water found it's way into a few different bags. Was hoping it was just one, but seems it happened with a few. Tried again, paid attention to seal up tightly and same results.
customer_reviews.author: alexandria paletta

customer_reviews.title: Great value, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: One of the best values money can buy. Save me alot when backpacking
customer_reviews.author: Tech 4 Zeds

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't love these more. They seal easily and are a great size.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Zipper hard to work with.
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept. I bought a starter pack that seems to have slightly better zipper strips. These bags don't seem to zip up as well, and it's usually a fight to get one fully zipped. Only hand washed, and they don't appear to be defective.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: great bags
customer_reviews.text: Silicone like bags that are easy to wash. holds s sandwich no problem. def recommend
customer_reviews.author: customer 1

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are AMAZING! They will save you in the cost for regular ziplocks and they’re super durable and easy to clean. I would highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are okay.
customer_reviews.text: The seal is not good after washing. Very hard to reseal.
customer_reviews.author: dazdnconfzd2

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great reusable bags. They wash easily and we found that the easiest way to dry is to use a whisk or large serving spoon to air dry on.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: these were great at first but after a few trips thru the ...
customer_reviews.text: these were great at first but after a few trips thru the dishwasher they dont zip closed anymore- or if they do it's because i had to really work at it and they dont stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: A Magnet for Pet Hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to minimize my use of single use plastic bags. The material is a magnet for pet hair making it not useable in my household. Nice concept, but I’ll be looking for alternate solutions.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hanesian

customer_reviews.title: No more plastic
customer_reviews.text: My complaint is that this can only be clean by hands but there are great for storing my meat or fruit 👌🏻 Or anything
customer_reviews.author: Fara D.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps food fresh. Had sliced apples in them that didn’t turn brown for several days. Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much! I use them in my daughters lunch every day instead of disposable bags. They look cool, they last a long time, & I need to order more!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bags. Easy to clean by hand and only slightly tricky to dry because they don’t stay open by themselves-easy enough though. I will definitely buy more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, easy to clean. And worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They are a great way to reduce single-use plastic in my life. Perfect for sandwiches and snacks. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: These bags are so well made. I debated the ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are so well made. I debated the price, but I know these will last a long time so well worth the price. Environmentally friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Jillybean1966

customer_reviews.title: Our money was happily spent on zipper bags made by Bumkins
customer_reviews.text: The washing and zipping of these bags were difficult and a nuisance. Bags have cracked and melted together in the dishwasher. Our money was happily spent on zipper bags made by Bumkins!
customer_reviews.author: Cthew

customer_reviews.title: Good but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to clean/takes forever to clean and dry. But I like the idea of reducing plastic baggie waste
customer_reviews.author: Tira Bickers

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Seals well. Easy to clean. Takes a little while to air dry, as expected with design.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely, thrilled with these bags. My kids love them as well so that has made the purchase even more worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dystini

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: I use these everyday to pack my lunch for work
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love them so far! My only issue is that drying them is a bit of a hassle, but otherwise the product is great!
customer_reviews.author: Colton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and carry
customer_reviews.text: Works for what I bought them for and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: They don't seal so well
customer_reviews.text: These are apparently dishwasher safe, but I can't seal 2 of them completely after I washed them on the top rack. Very difficult to seal all the way. Disappointed for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sustainable Sandwich Bags
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Slightly difficult to clean by hand, but so durable. I will never buy Ziploc bags again. The environment and your wallet will thank you for this sustainable purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifted Classroom

customer_reviews.title: These don’t seal!
customer_reviews.text: These are awful. After about a month it’s impossible to seal them. We don’t even use them anymore because the reclosable seal doesn’t work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love so much that I need more!
customer_reviews.text: These reusable bags are amazing. Perfect for home or travel, these bags did great for camping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very excited to get these. If we all used them, we would have so much less plastic trash.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Save the planet
customer_reviews.text: these work the same as a disposable plastic zip bag...
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great but Stain
customer_reviews.text: Love these as a replacement for ziplocks great for snacks but mine got in contact with tomato sauce in the sink and is now red. Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do not leak!
customer_reviews.text: They do not leak!!! Very easy to clean. We even used one as an ice pack, once the ice melted no leaks! Will buy more. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Replaces plastic sandwich and quart bags
customer_reviews.text: I use for anything I would have put in a quart or sandwich bag. A little hard to clean but have replaced at least 75% of plastic bag purchases. Would like to have bigger size options
customer_reviews.author: Abash

product_meta.title: rezip Lay-Flat Lunch Leakproof Reusable Storage Bag 5-Pack (Multi Color)
feature_bullets: 5-Pack includes: 1 (re)zip in each of these colors: moss green, orange, aqua, blue, and yellow. Dimensions: 8.5 x 7.75-inch. Hand Wash.
Ideal for use at Home or On the Go. Can be used for Snacks, Sandwiches, Travel, Home Organization and more
Made out of durable, food-grade PEVA material (which is also PVC, BPA and Lead free). Durable and Lightweight. Nest and Compress Flat for Convenient Storage
Transparent Design Allows for a Quick Glance at Contents Inside. Double-lock Closure provides an Airtight Leakproof Seal
Freezer Safe, Perfect for Fruit, or Soups and Stocks. One (re)zip replaces up to 300 disposable baggies
